thread.section_title: Egerton House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best martini in Europe
thread.title_full: Best martini in Europe - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Annie M
title: Best martini in Europe
text: We had the good fortune to wrap up our European vacation in London. We had been told by many to go to the Egerton House Hotel for one of Esley's famous martinis! We consider ourselves martini connoisseurs, and are thankful that we truly did find the BEST martini in Europe. Esley Gunaratne is so charming and gracious and set the tone for our fabulous afternoon. We can not wait to go back!
